findings.title: Mint Function
findings.description: No Mint Function detected Mint function is transparent or non-existent. Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token. Owner can mint new tokens and sell.

findings.title: Honeypot Risk
findings.description: The contract may block sell transfer from holder wallet or have extremely high tax rates, making it untradable.

findings.title: No Fee Setting function found
findings.description: The contract owner may contain the authority to modify the transaction tax. If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded (honeypot risk).

findings.title: Balance Modifier Function
findings.description: If there is a function for this, the contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses.

findings.title: Blacklist Function
findings.description: No Blacklist Setting function found. If there is a blacklist, some addresses may not be able to trade normally.

findings.title: Whitelist Function
findings.description: No Whitelist Setting function found. If there is a function for this Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming)
